entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure: 103.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -36.5°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
